attributes.action: Give all non British NHS workers visa extension regardless of  visa expiry date
attributes.additional_details: Government have already extended visa to few of our colleagues whose visa was due to expire before first October.Those front line NHS workers feel left out whose visa expire after 1st October. If this is token of appreciation towards front line NHS workers it should be apply to all who fight and risk their life for people of the uk
attributes.background: Government should extend visa to all front line nhs workers regardless of visa expiry date so that every one who is fighting covid-19 at front line will feel appreciated.
